info.title: Form Recognizer Client
info.description: Extracts information from forms and images into structured data.

get.description: Get information about all custom models

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: Specify whether to return summary or full list of models.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

post.description: Create and train a custom model. The request must include a source parameter that is either an externally accessible Azure storage blob container Uri (preferably a Shared Access Signature Uri) or valid path to a data folder in a locally mounted drive. When local paths are specified, they must follow the Linux/Unix path format and be an absolute path rooted to the input mount configuration setting value e.g., if '{Mounts:Input}' configuration setting value is '/input' then a valid source path would be '/input/contosodataset'. All data to be trained is expected to be under the source folder or sub folders under it. Models are trained using documents that are of the following content type - 'application/pdf', 'image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'image/tiff'. Other type of content is ignored.

Location.description: Location and ID of the model being trained. The status of model training is specified in the status property at the model location.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

get.description: Get detailed information about a custom model.

parameters.name: includeKeys
parameters.description: Include list of extracted keys in model information.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

delete.description: Mark model for deletion. Model artifacts will be permanently removed within a predetermined period.

204.description: Successfully marked model for deletion. Model artifacts will be removed within a predefined time period.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

post.description: Extract key-value pairs, tables, and semantic values from a given document. The input document must be of one of the supported content types - 'application/pdf', 'image/jpeg', 'image/png' or 'image/tiff'. Alternatively, use 'application/json' type to specify the location (Uri or local path) of the document to be analyzed.

parameters.name: includeTextDetails
parameters.description: Include text lines and element references in the result.

Operation-Location.description: URL containing the resultId used to track the progress and obtain the result of the analyze operation.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

get.description: Obtain current status and the result of the analyze form operation.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

post.description: Extract text and layout information from a given document. The input document must be of one of the supported content types - 'application/pdf', 'image/jpeg', 'image/png' or 'image/tiff'. Alternatively, use 'application/json' type to specify the location (Uri or local path) of the document to be analyzed.

Operation-Location.description: URL containing the resultId used to track the progress and obtain the result of the analyze operation.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

get.description: Track the progress and obtain the result of the analyze layout operation

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

post.description: Extract field text and semantic values from a given receipt document. The input document must be of one of the supported content types - 'application/pdf', 'image/jpeg', 'image/png' or 'image/tiff'. Alternatively, use 'application/json' type to specify the location (Uri or local path) of the document to be analyzed.

parameters.name: includeTextDetails
parameters.description: Include text lines and element references in the result.

Operation-Location.description: URL containing the resultId used to track the progress and obtain the result of the analyze operation.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

get.description: Track the progress and obtain the result of the analyze receipt operation.

default.description: Response entity accompanying non-successful responses containing additional details about the error.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the analyze operation was submitted.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the status was last updated.

AnalyzeOperationResult.description: Status and result of the queued analyze operation.

documentResults.description: Document-level information extracted from the input.

errors.description: List of errors reported during the analyze operation.

pageResults.description: Page-level information extracted from the input.

version.description: Version of schema used for this result.

BoundingBox.description: Quadrangle bounding box, with coordinates specified relative to the top-left of the original image. The eight numbers represent the four points, clockwise from the top-left corner relative to the text orientation. For image, the (x, y) coordinates are measured in pixels. For PDF, the (x, y) coordinates are measured in inches.

cells.description: List of cells contained in the table.

DataTable.description: Information about the extracted table contained in a page.

columnSpan.description: Number of columns spanned by this cell.

elements.description: When includeTextDetails is set to true, a list of references to the text elements constituting this table cell.

isFooter.description: Is the current cell a footer cell?

isHeader.description: Is the current cell a header cell?

rowSpan.description: Number of rows spanned by this cell.

DataTableCell.description: Information about the extracted cell in a table.

pageRange.description: First and last page number where the document is found.

DocumentResult.description: A set of extracted fields corresponding to the input document.

ElementReference.description: Reference to a line or word.

elements.description: When includeTextDetails is set to true, a list of references to the text elements constituting this field.

page.description: The 1-based page number in the input document.

text.description: Text content of the extracted field.

FieldValueType.description: Semantic data type of the field value.

accuracy.description: Estimated extraction accuracy for this field.

FormFieldsReport.description: Report for a custom model training field.

elements.description: When includeTextDetails is set to true, a list of references to the text elements constituting this key or value.

text.description: The text content of the key or value.

KeyValueElement.description: Information about the extracted key or value in a key-value pair.

label.description: A user defined label for the key/value pair entry.

KeyValuePair.description: Information about the extracted key-value pair.

clusters.description: Object mapping clusterIds to a list of keys.

KeysResult.description: Keys extracted by the custom model.

Model.description: Response to the get custom model operation.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the model was created.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the status was last updated.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of custom models.

count.description: Current count of trained custom models.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the summary was last updated.

limit.description: Max number of models that can be trained for this subscription.

summary.description: Summary of all trained custom models.

Models.description: Response to the list custom models operation.

keyValuePairs.description: List of key-value pairs extracted from the page.

tables.description: List of data tables extracted from the page.

PageResult.description: Extracted information from a single page.

angle.description: The general orientation of the text in clockwise direction, measured in degrees between (-180, 180].

height.description: The height of the image/PDF in pixels/inches, respectively.

lines.description: When includeTextDetails is set to true, a list of recognized text lines. The maximum number of lines returned is 300 per page. The lines are sorted top to bottom, left to right, although in certain cases proximity is treated with higher priority. As the sorting order depends on the detected text, it may change across images and OCR version updates. Thus, business logic should be built upon the actual line location instead of order.

page.description: The 1-based page number in the input document.

unit.description: The unit used by the width, height and boundingBox properties. For images, the unit is "pixel". For PDF, the unit is "inch".

width.description: The width of the image/PDF in pixels/inches, respectively.

ReadResult.description: Text extracted from a page in the input document.

SourceDataStream.description: A PDF document, image (jpg/png/tiff), or JSON file to analyze.

SourcePath.description: Uri or local path to source data.

text.description: The text content of the line.

words.description: List of words in the text line.

TextLine.description: An object representing an extracted text line.

text.description: The text content of the word.

source.description: Source path containing the training documents.

useLabelFile.description: Use label file for training a model.

TrainRequest.description: Request parameter to train a new custom model.

errors.description: Errors returned during the training operation.

fields.description: List of fields used to train the model and the train operation error reported by each.

trainingDocuments.description: List of the documents used to train the model and any errors reported in each document.

includeSubFolders.description: A flag to indicate if sub folders within the set of prefix folders will also need to be included when searching for content to be preprocessed.

prefix.description: A case-sensitive prefix string to filter documents in the source path for training. For example, when using a Azure storage blob Uri, use the prefix to restrict sub folders for training.

TrainSourceFilter.description: Filter to apply to the documents in the source path for training.

TrainingDocumentInfo.description: Report for a custom model training document.

Endpoint.name: endpoint
Endpoint.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://westus2.api.cognitive.microsoft.com).
